welcome.title: Welcome to Starship Psychics
welcome.paragraph1: Thank you for becoming part of a growing community of spiritualists. We are honored to have you spend time on our site and genuinely hope you enjoy your visit.
welcome.paragraph2: We invite you to visit My Account/Preferences to enhance your experience with the oracle. You may also wish to visit My Account/Settings and Security.
welcome.paragraph3: The oracle looks forward to your conversation. The people at Starship Psychics.
